definition: A complex network of interconnected components and processes that involve the generation, distribution, and utilization of various forms of energy. It encompasses the infrastructure, technologies, and systems required for the production, transmission, and consumption of energy resources. This term is commonly used in the context of discussing sustainable and renewable energy systems, as well as the optimization and integration of different energy sources.
